meta.title: Celari — Hidden by Design | Privacy-First Wallet on Aztec
meta.description: The first WebAuthn/Passkey-native smart wallet on Aztec Network. Zero seed phrases. Zero metadata. Zero compromise.
meta.ogDescription: Replace seed phrases with Face ID. Transact privately with zero-knowledge proofs.

hero.title: CELARI
hero.subtitle: Privacy is not a feature. It's architecture.

private.title: Private by Default
private.description: Built on Aztec's encrypted rollup. Every transaction is shielded. No one sees your balance, your history, or your identity.

passkey.title: Passkey Auth
passkey.description: Face ID. Fingerprint. Hardware key. Sign in the way you already trust. No more 24-word seed phrases.

metadata.title: Zero Metadata
metadata.description: We don't track IPs. We don't log requests. Even we can't see who you are or what you do.

abstraction.title: Account Abstraction
abstraction.description: Smart contract wallets with social recovery, gas sponsorship, and batched transactions.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Every line of code is auditable. Trust is verified, not assumed. MIT licensed.

ux.title: Crafted UX
ux.description: Privacy tools shouldn't feel like terminal windows. Celari is built for humans.

authenticate.title: Authenticate with Passkey
authenticate.description: Use Face ID, fingerprint, or your hardware security key. A secure enclave generates your private key — it never leaves your device.

deploy.title: Your Wallet Deploys Privately
deploy.description: A smart contract wallet is deployed on the Aztec network. Encrypted by default. Only you know it exists.

transact.title: Transact in the Shadows
transact.description: Send, receive, and interact with DeFi protocols. Every action is shielded by zero-knowledge proofs.

aztec.title: The First Encrypted Rollup Deserves the First Private Wallet
aztec.description: Aztec brings programmable privacy to Ethereum. Celari makes it accessible. Together, we build a financial system where privacy isn't optional.

phase0.name: Phase 0
phase0.title: Schnorr Prototype
phase0.description: Initial proof of concept with Schnorr signature scheme on Aztec.

phase1.name: Phase 1
phase1.title: Passkey + Extension
phase1.description: WebAuthn/P256 integration, Chrome MV3 extension, full deploy pipeline, 95 tests.

phase2.name: Phase 2
phase2.title: L1–L2 Bridge
phase2.description: Ethereum bridge integration, custom tokens/RPC, faucet, SDK release.

phase3.name: Phase 3
phase3.title: Batch Payroll
phase3.description: Private batch_pay contract. Pay 100 employees in a single ZK transaction.

phase4.name: Phase 4
phase4.title: Crypto Card
phase4.description: Virtual and physical card linked to your private wallet. Spend anywhere.

phase5.name: Phase 5
phase5.title: Mobile + Cross-chain
phase5.description: Native iOS/Android app. Cross-chain private transfers via bridge aggregation.

waitlist.subtitle: Be among the first to reclaim your privacy
